Description of incident: UC Irvine Medical Center has notified patients of a data breach when an employee reviewed patient records without authorization.The information this individual may have gained access to included names, dates of birth, gender, medical record numbers, height, weight, Medical Center account number, allergy informaton, home addresses, medical documentation, diagnoses, test orders/results, medications, employment status, and names of your health plan and employer. The medical center is providing those who were affected FraudStop free for one year. For questions call 1-888-653-6036.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-56428
